Concerned with deconstructions

(In Progress)

By Kat Macdonald

Written for the London Community Laptop Orchestra

Duration: ~25 minutes

Accessibility - Medium

Files are compressed again and again, slowly devolving until near unrecognisable.

Play them with each compression. Best performed with multiple files.

In reference to Alvin Lucier’s “I Am Sitting In A Room” but for ensemble.

return?
